title: MASSIVE Malzahar Bugs List
body:
Hello all. I love Malzahar {{champion:90}} and play him a lot. Here is a list of bugs I have compiled.

1. If you die with 3 voidling stacks and then die. When you cast another spell, it resets to 0 even though the stacks are still there.
2. If you put visions on Sion when he dies, it won't jump to another target
3. When ult'ing, it takes a little bit before they get rooted in place. This allows them to cast spells, auto attack and other things sending the ult on cooldown.
4. Minions derping (I can be auto attacking a target and the minion will just be AFK beside me)
5. Putting visions on the very last moment before a target dies, the ability will go on cooldown without jumping to another target.
6. There is also a bug with his passive, where if you die while passive being up (next spell spawns creep), then you have the "thing" underneath you the whole game.
7. If you have Visions on a champion and another visions on a minion, if the minion dies, it doesn't renew the visions. 

If you have more Malzahar bugs, please post them.

replies.body: Malzahar's ulti doesn't go well with zhonyas. If it did I would be so happy. Even though it'd be OP.

all of those are easily explained...
1: dying resets your passive. always has.
2: sion has a psuedo death, same thing as with GA and zil ult. if the duration is still there it will stay on them after the animation of rebirth.
3: same as all suppression's, if they get out of range while channeling the charge up they can escape it. its what made skarner so underplayed for a long time, because when his ALWAYS suppressed it was broken, being able to reverse flashes and such. its called outplaying the ability, escaping it before it lands completely. pretty sure it goes on a reduced CD when it fails tho, like skarners ult.
4: it targets malific visions, not the one you are attacking, it has a smaller aggro range than your AA range, move closer or cast visions.
5: casting abilities late does that for just about everything. try casting on time instead of complaining you casted incorrectly. not a bug. not to mention it deals its first tick of damage 1 second after casting.
6: same as 1. dying resets. if you have a "thing" standing with you all game it might be a visual error. like the old zed shadow errors.
7: it jumps to the champ, visions dont stack.

I absolutely love Malzahar as a champion but I shied away from playing him due to how buggy he is (mainly the stupidity of his crabs at times) and because his ult can be interrupted by a shallow breeze passing over the Rift. I'm not kidding his ult gets interrupted by any and all things and I got sick of it. But yeah the ult suppression should be instantaneous, such as Warwicks ultimate, because that .5 seconds of spell/attack castability can save lives.

EDIT: This isn't the optimal place for reporting bugs either friend, I'm pretty sure there is a proper board for reporting bugs, let me check.

Ahh yes there is one but it is integrated with NA, here it is: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report
